Hope this isn't off-topic:

Is anyone using something like WADL for service=
 definition documentation?  We're (hopefully) going to have a collection of=
 many services in multiple domains and we'll be expected to have a standard=
 'template' for defining/documenting a service. I'm curious if anyone in an=
 "enterprise" situation has run into that and has any advice.

Thanks!
Carl=
os
